p: To a stirred solution of phosphoester 18 (156 mg, 0.28 mmol) in MeCN (2.5 mL) and H 2O (0.5 mL) was added ceric ammonium nitrate (614 mg, 1.1 mmol) at 0 °C. After stirring for 20 min at 0 °C, the resulting mixture was directly purified by silica gel column chromatography to afford 5 (93 mg, 75%) as a white solid. 5: Colorless crystal; R f 0.5 (EtOAc/MeOH = 10/1); 1H-NMR (600 MHz, MeOD), δ in ppm major-isomer 8.34 (s, 1H), 8.26 (s, 1H), 7.30–7.26 (1H, overlapped), 7.15–7.11 (1H, overlapped), 7.07–7.06 (m, 1H), 6.96–6.94 (m, 1H), 6.45–6.41 (1H, overlapped), 5.43–5.26 (2H, overlapped), 4.94–4.87 (1H, overlapped), 4.44–4.35 (2H, overlapped), 3.21 (s, 1H), 2.94–2.89 (1H, overlapped), 2.73–2.67 (1H, overlapped); minor-isomer 8.37 (s, 1H), 8.30 (s, 1H), 7.30–7.26 (1H, overlapped), 7.15–7.11 (2H, overlapped), 6.91 (d, J = 8.2 Hz, 1H), 6.45-6.41 (1H, overlapped), 5.43–5.26 (2H, overlapped), 4.94–4.87 (1H, overlapped), 4.44–4.35 (2H, overlapped), 3.19 (s, 1H), 2.94–2.89 (1H, overlapped), 2.73-2.67 (1H, overlapped); 13C-NMR (150 MHz, MeOD) δ C major-isomer 152.2, 151.0 (d, J C-P = 6.5 Hz), 149.4, 145.9, 144.2, 131.0, 126.7, 125.81, 122.0, 120.7, 119.3 (d, J C-P = 8.8 Hz), 84.8, 84.41, 80.12, 78.7, 71.5, 70.0 (d, J C-P = 6.6 Hz), 38.42; Minor-isomer 152.3, 150.9 (d, J C-P = 7.6 Hz), 149.5, 146.0, 144.1, 130.9, 126.8, 125.79, 121.9, 120.6, 119.2 (d, J C-P = 7.7 Hz), 84.7, 84.36, 80.06, 78.8, 71.6, 70.2 (d, J C-P = 6.5 Hz), 38.37; IR ν max (film) 3246, 3070, 2115, 1688, 1609, 1489 cm −1; UV (MeOH) λ max (log ε) 212 (4.35), 261 (3.83) nm; HRMS (ESI) m/ z = calcd 466.0886 [M + Na] +, found 466.0889 [M + Na] +.
